HIGH SCHOOL

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”justified” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Altamira International School, we distinguish ourselves by working under the approach of Project-Based Learning (PBL), which has transferability to unseen contexts.

We believe that learning is not limited to acquiring theoretical knowledge; rather, we strive for students to apply what they have learned practically and meaningfully in real projects. At Altamira International School, a student is more than a passive recipient of information.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”#F2F2F2″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items: center;||flex-wrap: wrap;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_padding=”|65px||150px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”20px|20px|20px|20px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items: center;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”justified” max_width=”500px” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A student is an active and committed individual who immerses themselves in challenging projects that stimulate their curiosity and problem-solving abilities. Through PBL, students have the opportunity to investigate, explore, and collaborate to address authentic challenges and develop innovative solutions.

The fundamental principles that guide our educational approach through PBL are leadership, citizenship, character, critical thinking, and communication. These principles are not only promoted in the classroom but also applied practically in the projects that students develop.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/IMG_3728.jpg” title_text=”IMG_3728″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ max_width=”1280px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-8@3x-8-2.png” title_text=”Recurso 8@3x-8″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”16px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A student is an active and committed individual who immerses themselves in challenging projects that stimulate their curiosity and problem-solving abilities. Through PBL, students have the opportunity to investigate, explore, and collaborate to address authentic challenges and develop innovative solutions.

The fundamental principles that guide our educational approach through PBL are leadership, citizenship, character, critical thinking, and communication. These principles are not only promoted in the classroom but also applied practically in the projects that students develop.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items: center;||flex-wrap: wrap;” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”order: 1;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”order: 2;”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/IMG_1646-1.jpeg” title_text=”IMG_1646 (1)” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”|150px||45px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|50px|50px|50px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”20px|20px|20px|20px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”display:flex;||align-items: center;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”display:flex;||align-items: center;||order: 2;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”display:flex;||align-items: center;||order: 1;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”justified” max_width=”500px” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our students have access to various student clubs with the purpose of providing them opportunities to participate, learn, and lead, allowing students to pursue their passions and interests alongside fellow students while developing leadership and teamwork skills.

Student clubs at AIS provide an excellent opportunity to apply for scholarships and national or international networking experiences.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 100%” background_image=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Diseno-sin-titulo-18-2.webp” background_position=”top_center” background_blend=”overlay” custom_padding=”170px||170px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”60px||60px||true|false” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” height=”100vh” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ text_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”80px” text_orientation=”center” text_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”55vh||||false|false” text_text_shadow_style=”preset1″]

AIS PROM 2024 – 2025

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://altamira.edu.co/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Recurso-10@3x-8-1.png” title_text=”Recurso 10@3x-8″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”100px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”|800|||||||” text_text_color=”gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507″ text_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”24px” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-c06f992e-1a1f-4a27-8457-39b06448a507%22:%91%22text_text_color%22%93}”]

AT ALTAMIRA SCHOOL,

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”16px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are “committed to empowering lifelong learners by providing a safe, encouraging and academically challenging environment, that fosters personal development and intellectual growth, enabling students to succeed as responsible, global leaders.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_text_color=”#353535″ text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”16px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our students not only acquire theoretical knowledge, but also learn to apply that knowledge in projects that simulate real-world situations. Through these projects, students develop problem-solving skills, critical thinking, collaboration, and effective communication.

The Innovation Center is a dedicated space to promote PBL and innovation among our students. Here, they are provided with the opportunity to work on interdisciplinary projects, where they can apply their knowledge in fields such as science, technology, engineering, and the arts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFyCpQ7fQEM” _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ background_color=”gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-56c153ff-af19-4dd2-ad24-db6135076b29%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ max_width=”1280px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ text_font=”|800|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”16px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

IN ORDER TO ACCOMPLISH OUR MISSION, OUR ACADEMIC PROGRAM IS FOCUSED ON PROVIDING RICH LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES FOR STUDENTS OF ALL ABILITY LEVELS.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
